trans-unit.source: Stores channel data for the remoting channels.
trans-unit.target: 存储通道的远程处理通道的数据。

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level.
trans-unit.target: 此类，使链接要求，并且在类级别继承要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>直接调用方或派生的类没有基础结构权限时，将引发。</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelDataStore"></xref> class with the URIs that the current channel maps to.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelDataStore"></xref>类与当前的通道映射到的 Uri。

trans-unit.source: An array of channel URIs that the current channel maps to.
trans-unit.target: 通道的 Uri，当前的通道映射到一个数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of channel URIs that the current channel maps to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的通道 Uri 当前的通道映射到的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of channel URIs that the current channel maps to.
trans-unit.target: 通道的 Uri，当前的通道映射到一个数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data object that is associated with the specified key for the implementing channel.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与指定键的实现通道相关联的数据对象。

trans-unit.source: The key that the data object is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 数据对象与之关联的键。

trans-unit.source: The specified data object for the implementing channel.
trans-unit.target: 实现通道指定的数据对象。
